description:

Sadly, it’s been confirmed that Gauthier has died at age 48. As shared by Variety, Gauthier is said to have died by an “unspecified short illness” on February 23. This is certainly [...]

title: ‘Freddy Vs. Jason’ Actor Chris Gauthier Dead At 48
